products.name: Turbo Noir — Custom Card Series #01
products.short: Hand-finished Hot Wheels card with metallic ink and embossed plating.
products.long: A limited-edition custom card created for collectors. Metallic foiling, hand-numbered backplate, archival coating. Includes certificate of authenticity and archival sleeve.

products.name: Industrial Atelier Diorama — Module A
products.short: Studio-grade mini diorama with LED backlighting and weathered detail.
products.long: A 1:64 scale diorama garage handcrafted from resin, metal, and mixed media. Integrated warm/cool LED accents, removable vehicle mount, and hard case for shipping.

products.name: Industrial Key — Brass Hot Wheels Keychain
products.short: Brass & powder-coat keychain with industrial clasp.
products.long: A tactile keychain crafted in solid brass with powder-coated accents. Engineered to handle daily wear while keeping a collector aesthetic.

products.name: Tact Lanyard — Urban Camo
products.short: Tactical webbing lanyard with quick-release and ID window.
products.long: A high-durability lanyard built from military-grade webbing and aviation hardware. Designed for carrying keys, mini tools, or display keys for conventions.

products.name: Framed Miniature — Retro Racer
products.short: Archival framed LEGO miniature with museum-grade mount.
products.long: An iconic LEGO mini reimagined as a framed gallery piece. Archival matting, museum glass, and brushed steel frame. Ready to hang.

dioramas.title: Atelier Module A
dioramas.desc: Industrial assembly bay with warm tungsten accents.

dioramas.title: Night Shift Bay
dioramas.desc: Nocturnal scene with neon highlights and smog haze.
